parameters.name: RoutingSettingsFilename
parameters.description: Full path name of file to which to save routing settings; file name must have an extension of .sqy

title: IRoutingSettings.SaveRoutingSettingsToFile
description: Saves routing settings to the specified file.

parameters.name: RoutingSettingsFilename
parameters.description: Full path name of file to which to save routing settings; file name must have an extension of .sqy

returns: True if successful, false if not
